total of 68 row for mine and you can follow the colours exactly using the colour guide on page 5 if you like ✽ if you don t want to change colour at the end of any round simply make a slip_stitch into 1ch * 3tr 2ch 3tr 1ch * into next space repeat from * to * twice more 2tr into starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn and join new colour to corner space round 3 4ch 3tr into same space *1ch 3tr in 1ch space 1ch 3tr 2ch 3tr into corner space repeat from * to * twice more 1ch 3tr in 1ch space 1ch 2tr into starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn and join new colour to corner space round 4 4ch 3tr into same space *1ch work 3tr in next space 1ch for each space along the side then 3tr 2ch 3tr into corner space * repeat from * to * twice more 1ch work 3tr in next space 1ch for each space along the side then 2tr into starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn and join new colour to corner space keep working more rounds as given for round 4 changing colour at the end of each round until you have worked a total of 68 rounds or you have a size you are happy with border join the border colour to corner space
